titleStmt.title: An excellent new play-house song; called, The bonny gray-ey'd morn; or, Jockie rouz'd with love. To an excellent new tune.
titleStmt.author: D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to D'Urfey by Wing (2nd ed.).
Place and date of publication suggested by National Library of Scotland.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
